You must have access to masterwork artisan's tools designed for weaponsmithing to perform this alteration. This alteration lasts for 8 hours. Weapon modifications you add this way only provide their benefits to you; any other wielder treats the weapon as one category more difficult to use than normal, but does not gain its benefits.

Bundle.title: Crescent Blade Dervish
Bundle.description: In the thick of battle, your crescent blades spin in arcs of glittering death, striking faster than the eye can follow.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Dex 13, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (crescent blade), base attack bonus +2.

Benefit.p: When you wield a crescent blade and you threaten three or more opponents, you gain one additional attack at your highest base attack bonus.

Special.p: You can use Crescent Blade Dervish in conjunction with the Whirlwind Attack feat. In such a case, you can attack every foe you threaten, plus an additional foe of your choosing a second time.

Bundle.title: Crescent Blade Master
Bundle.description: You have perfected the use of crescent blades, gaining a deadly control to which few have ever aspired.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Dex 13, Int 13, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (crescent blade).

Benefit.p: You do not take a penalty on attack rolls when wielding a crescent blade. Additionally, you treat crescent blades as if they had the disarm and trip qualities. (See page 20 for details on crescent blades.)

Normal.p: Crescent blades impose a -2 penalty on attack rolls.

Bundle.title: Crippling Critical
Bundle.description: You are able to maim a target and hinder its movement.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Critical Focus, base attack bonus +13.

Benefit.p: Whenever you score a critical hit against an opponent, its speed is halved for 1 minute. A successful Fortitude save reduces this duration to 1d4 rounds. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + your base attack bonus. Against creatures with multiple types of movement, you must choose which movement type to affect. A flying creature hit by this attack must make a DC 10 Fly check to remain airborne, and has its maneuverability reduced by one step.

Special.p: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.

Bundle.title: Crippling Thrust
Bundle.description: With one precise stab, you hamper movement.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Weapon Focus with piercing weapon, base attack bonus +6.

Benefit.p: As a standard action, make a single attack with your chosen weapon. If the attack hits, the target's movement speed is halved until the start of your next turn. When your base attack bonus reaches +11, the target's movement is so hampered that even a 5-foot step provokes an attack of opportunity. When your base attack bonus reaches +16, the target must also succeed at a Reflex save with a DC equal to 10 + your base attack bonus or become entangled. An entangled creature's movement can be halved only once. You can use this feat's benefits only once per minute.

Bundle.title: Critical Focus
Bundle.description: You are trained in the art of causing pain.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +9.

Benefit.p: You receive a +4 circumstance bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits

Bundle.title: Crossbow Mastery
Bundle.description: You can load crossbows with blinding speed and even fire them in melee with little fear of reprisal.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Dex 15, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Reload, Rapid Shot.

Benefit.p: The time required for you to reload any type of crossbow is reduced to a free action, regardless of the type of crossbow used. You can fire a crossbow as many times in a full attack action as you could attack if you were using a bow. Reloading a crossbow for the type of crossbow you chose when you took Rapid Reload no longer provokes attacks of opportunity.

Special.p: Starting at 6th level, a ranger with the archery combat style may select Crossbow Mastery as a combat style feat.

Bundle.title: Crusader's Fist
Bundle.Prerequisites: Lay on hands class feature or touch of corruption class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6.

Benefit.p: When you attack with an unarmed strike and hit a creature that you can harm with your lay on hands or touch of corruption feature, you can use a swift action to expend a daily use of that feature to deal its normal damage as if you had hit with the feature's normal touch attack. This extra damage is not multiplied if you scored a critical hit.

Bundle.title: Crushing Blow
Bundle.description: Your focus allows you to smash your enemy's defenses.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist.

Benefit.p: You can make a Stunning Fist attempt as a full-round action. If successful, instead of stunning your target, you reduce the target's AC by an amount equal to your Wisdom modifier for 1 minute. This penalty does not stack with other penalties applied due to Crushing Blow.

Bundle.title: Crushing Impact
Bundle.description: You slam into your foes with brute strength as unyielding as a wall.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Bull Rush, Improved Unarmed Strike, Power Attack.

Benefit.p: Whenever you successfully bull rush an enemy and its movement is stopped by a solid object or barrier, you deal your unarmed strike damage to the foe, as long as it's within your threatened area. If you performed your bull rush as part of a charge, you gain a +2 bonus on your damage roll.

Bundle.title: Cudgeler Style
Bundle.description: You have learned how to rush your foe and deliver an incapacitating blow.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Bludgeoner.

Benefit.p: When you hit with a charge attack to deal nonlethal damage while using this style, your weapon deals damage as if it were one size category larger than it actually is. If you have the ability to make more than one attack on a charge, this increase applies only to your first attack.

Bundle.title: Cudgeler Sweep
Bundle.description: Your powerful blows can knock down your opponents.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Bludgeoner, Cudgeler Style, base attack bonus +5 or monk level 5th.

Benefit.p: When you hit with a charge attack using the Cudgeler Style feat, you can immediately attempt a single trip combat maneuver check against the target with a +2 competence bonus as a free action. This provokes an attack of opportunity as normal for a trip combat maneuver.

Bundle.title: Cudgeler Takedown
Bundle.description: Opponents you batter to the ground stay down.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Bludgeoner, Cudgeler Style, Cudgeler Sweep, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.

Benefit.p: When you hit with a charge attack using the Cudgeler Style feat, your weapon deals damage as though it were one size category larger for 1 round or until it leaves your hand. When you successfully trip an opponent with the Cudgeler Sweep feat, your opponent must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + your character level + your Strength modifier) or be stunned for 1 round.

Bundle.title: Cultivate Magic Plants
Bundle.description: You combine a natural green thumb and knowledge of magic in order to grow magic plants.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Brew Potion, Craft Wondrous Item; Knowledge (nature) 1 rank.

Benefit.p: You can cultivate magic plants. Cultivating a magic plant takes 1 week per 1,000 gp in its base price.
When you create a magic plant, you make the same choices that you would normally make when casting the spell. Whoever consumes the fruit of the magic plant is the target of the spell.

Bundle.title: Cunning Intuition
Bundle.description: You can read your foe's body language to gauge your foe and gain an edge in combat.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Alertness, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Quick Draw, Ready for Anything, base attack bonus +13 or rogue level 13th, Sense Motive 13 ranks.

Benefit.p: When you ready an action, you do not need to declare what action you will take, only the trigger for that action and an action type (either standard, move, swift, or free). If you choose the standard action type, you can take a move action instead when your readied action triggers.
When the condition triggers, you can choose a specific action of the appropriate type to take.

Bundle.title: Curative Mastery
Bundle.description: You can invoke a magic item's innate conjuration magic to conjure positive energy for healing wounds.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Use Magic Device 1 rank, base Fortitude bonus +2.

Benefit.p: You can cause an item that has a 1st-level or higher conjuration spell listed in its construction requirements to cast cure light wounds as a spell-like ability, using the item's caster level as the spell's caster level. You can use this feat once per day, plus one additional time per day when your base Fortitude save bonus reaches +4, +6, +8, +10, and +12.

You can expend two uses of this feat to cast cure moderate wounds, three uses to cast cure serious wounds, four uses to cast cure critical wounds, and five uses to cast breath of life, provided that the item's construction requirements include a spell whose level is equal to or greater than the level of the spell-like ability to be used (2nd level for cure moderate wounds, 3rd level for cure serious wounds, 4th level for cure critical wounds, and 5th level for breath of life).

Bundle.title: Curious Companion
Bundle.description: Heroes tend to pick up the oddest friendsbirds of the sky and beasts of the wood. Your companions are strange even by these standards.
Bundle.Prerequisites: Animal companion class feature.

Benefit.p: You can select a plant companion or vermin companion as your animal companion.
